10.eng-name: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prayed one day then left and said: '0 so-and-so, why don't you improve your prayer? Shouldn't the one who is praying reflection how he prays it for himself? I can see behind me just as I can see in front of me
